name: Hybrid Rift-Runner Sloop
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Blueprint cutaway: Hybrid Rift-Runner Sloop, top/side/cross-section/decks, ballast, pressure hulls, engines, crew, clean blueprint, fantasy nautical/aeronautical vernacular with realm materials, cosmic surrealism, impossible geometries, starfield grain, indigo glows, sturdy functional blueprint vernacular, palette: indigos, violets, black, cold silver, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Use numbered callout pins (01, 02, 03â€¦) instead of long text annotations. Include a clean legend area without rendering complex paragraphs., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Blueprint cutaway of Hybrid Rift-Runner Sloop.
callouts: numbered pins 01..10; legend area reserved; no paragraph labels
revised_prompt: An image of a fantastical tabletop setting, presenting a Blueprint cutaway of a hybrid Rift-Runner Sloop boat. Display the boat from top, side, and cross-section views, illustrating its decks, ballast, pressure hulls, engines, and crew. The materials and gear used should match a coherent, medieval fantasy culture with no modern technology. Maintain a painterly style consistent with the whole collection. Add elements of cosmic surrealism and impossible geometries to the setting, including a starfield grain and indigo glows. The color palette should predominantly feature indigos, violets, black, and cold silver. Legends should be presented cleanly, preferably identified with numbered callout pins (01, 02, 03, etc.) rather than lengthy texts. Modern signage, sci-fi User Interfaces, photoreal CGI, and anime styles should be avoided.
